title: Warning, The Crackdown Begins (Ep 1441)
description:
In this episode, I discuss this extremely dangerous proposal by a radical Democrat which will breach the dam, and rapidly move us towards a police state. 

News Picks:

Totalitarian congresswoman demands the FBI investigate Parler.


Is CNN acting as the PR shop for the Biden administration?

Even left wing Politico is starting to detect a problem with the fawning media coverage of Biden.


The article discussed in the show today about the constrained versus the unconstrained conflict of visions.

The threat to scrap the filibuster is real. 


Biden halts work on the border wall.


Moratoriums on evictions are destined to cause even worse housing problems.


China is making moves in the cryptocurrency market.
